# HWK09.package

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HWK09.package is to add ten to each number. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of HWK09.package like so:

You can install the released version of demopckg from [GitHub](https://github.com/EBelevska/MICR475) with:

``` {r}
devtools::install_github("EBelevska/HWK09.package")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(HWK09.package)
```
